description.value: You can teleport across the battlefield, disappearing and appearing in a burst of hellfire and brimstone, a flash of lightning, a cloud of caustic gas, or other environmental hazard common within your planned realm. You can cast translocate as a 4th-rank divine innate spell at will. When you do, spaces adjacent to the one you leave from and the one you appear in are momentarily filled with a damaging energy common to your realm, dealing @Damage[4d6[untyped]] damage of your realm's damage type to creatures in the affected spaces (@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher).
